name: Bank of America Corporation - Preferred Shares
description: Bank of America Corporation (BAC) is one of the world's leading financial institutions, serving individual consumers, small- and middle-market businesses, and large corporations with a full range of banking, investing, asset management, and other financial and risk management products and services. Founded in 1904 and headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina, Bank of America operates through various segments, including Consumer Banking, Global Wealth & Investment Management, Global Banking, and Global Markets. The company is committed to responsible growth and sustainable practices, promoting financial literacy, and investing in the communities it serves. As a publicly traded company, Bank of America offers a variety of equity and debt instruments, including preferred shares which provide investors with a stable income stream. The preferred shares can offer attractive yields compared to common stock, making them a popular choice for income-focused investors. The company continues to innovate in its service delivery, leveraging technology to enhance customer experience and improve operational efficiency. Bank of America’s mission is to help make financial lives better through the power of every connection.
